content: Those little creatures on the beach don't have much meat, so why bother eating them? I'm holding these shellfish tongs just because... they look cool!

content: I don't really like shore-dwellers. So why am I holding a pair of shellfish tongs? It's just to make the crabs run faster. {A虎啸}I don't catch them. I just enjoy watching them scuttle away.
